info.title: MoreRecipes
info.description: Api documentation for More Recipes web application

get.description: Endpoint to get a single recipe

put.description: Endpoint for a user to update their recipe

delete.description: Endpoint for a user to delete their recipe

post.description: Endpoint to search for a recipe by name or by ingredients
Endpoint for users to sign up to use the application
Endpoint for users to login to use the application

get.description: Endpoint to view a user's profile

put.description: Endpoint for users to edit their profile

post.description: Endpoint for users to create recipes
Endpoint for a user to add review for a recipe
Endpoint for users to add a recipe as favourite

get.description: Endpoint for users to get all their favourite recipes

post.description: Endpoint for a user to downvote recipe
